echo.message: Create Directory Information Tree on ${fim.server.context} at ${fim.server.host}:${fim.server.port}

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Identifies the default base where groups are resides

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Identifies the default base where users are resides

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Technical account used by Directory Services to connect to a certain instance

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Technical account used by WebLogic serves to connect to a certain instance

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Technical account used by the IAM domain components to connect to a certain instance

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Technical account used by Identity Manager to connect to a certain instance

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: >Technical account used by Access Manager to connect to a certain instance

attribute.name: description
attribute.value: Technical account used by IMAP Server to connect to a certain instance

echo.message: Create Access Privilege Groups at ${fim.server.context} on ${fim.server.host}:${fim.server.port}
Create Access Control Information (ACI) at ${fim.server.context} on ${fim.server.host}:${fim.server.port}

value.value: (targetattr="*")(targetscope="subtree")(version 3.0; acl "Allow orclGroupWritePrivilegeGroup add, read and write access to all attributes"; allow (read,search,compare,write,add,delete,import,export)(groupdn="ldap:///cn=orclGroupWritePrivilegeGroup,ou=Groups,${fim.server.context}");)
(targetattr="*")(targetscope="base")(version 3.0; acl "Anonymous read access to People"; allow (search,read)(userdn="ldap:///anyone");)

(targetattr="*")(targetscope="subtree")(version 3.0; acl "Read acces to People entries"; allow (search,read,compare)(userdn="ldap:///self" or groupdn="ldap:///cn=orclUserReadPrivilegeGroup,ou=Groups,${fim.server.context}");)

(targetattr="+")(targetscope="subtree")(version 3.0; acl "Group read acces to People entries"; allow (search,read,compare)(groupdn="ldap:///cn=orclUserReadPrivilegeGroup,ou=Groups,${fim.server.context}");)
(targetattr="userPassword")(targetscope="subtree")(version 3.0; acl "Self write access to People"; allow (write)(userdn="ldap:///self");)

(targetattr="*")(targetscope="subtree")(version 3.0; acl "Allow orclUserWritePrivilegeGroup add, read and write access to all attributes"; allow (read,search,compare,write,add,delete,import,export)(groupdn="ldap:///cn=orclUserWritePrivilegeGroup,ou=Groups,${fim.server.context}");)

echo.message: Create Participant Context Root at ${fim.server.context} on ${fim.server.host}:${fim.server.port}

target.name: 0200-MV
target.description: Configures Federation Particpant Police Mecklenburg-Western Pomerania

target.description: Configures Federation Particpant Police Lower Saxony

target.description: Configures Federation Particpant Police North Rhine-Westphalia
